incidents.name: Degraded performance of Admin Hub, Atlassian Analytics, Confluence Cloud, Focus, Jira, Jira Product Discovery, Jira Service Management, and Rovo

incident_updates.body: We are actively investigating reports of performance degradation affecting Admin Hub, Atlassian Analytics, Confluence Cloud, Focus, Jira, Jira Product Discovery, Jira Service Management, Jira Work Management, and Rovo. We'll share updates here as more information is available.

We are actively investigating reports of performance degradation affecting Admin Hub, Atlassian Analytics, Confluence Cloud, Focus, Jira, Jira Product Discovery, Jira Service Management, and Rovo. We'll share updates here as more information is available.
